name: the LAST LETTER
description: The Last Letter is a VR Narrative Puzzle Game. An enigmatic letter of girlfriend’s Grandma accompanying an antique board game will lead you to the discovery of a mysterious and fantastic world.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: Core i5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 970 Storage: ５ GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: 10 Processor: Core i7 Memory: 16 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 1070 Storage: ５ GB available space
